Deprecated Interfaces
br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.InterceptorSequence
           
 

Deprecated Classes
br.com.caelum.vraptor.core.DefaultRequestExecution
          This class is deprecated. If you extend a request execution, consider using @Intercepts(after=..., before=...) instead. 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.interceptor.InterceptorListPriorToExecutionExtractor
          This class is deprecated. If you extend a request execution, consider using @Intercepts(after=..., before=...) instead. 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.PatternBasedStrategy
           
br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.PatternBasedType
          Use @Path instead. 
 

Deprecated Methods
br.com.caelum.vraptor.core.InterceptorStack.addAsNext(Class)
           
br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.forward()
          As of 3.2, replaced by #forwardTo() 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.forward(String)
          As of 3.2, replaced by PageResult.forwardTo(String url) 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.DefaultRouteBuilder.is(PatternBasedType, PatternBasedType)
          Use @Path or override RoutesConfiguration behavior 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.Rules.method(String)
          Override the behavior of RoutesParser instead 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.HttpResult.movedPermanentlyTo(Class)
          use result.use(status()).movedPermanentlyTo(ClientsController.class).list(); instead 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.HttpResult.movedPermanentlyTo(String)
          use result.use(status()).movedPermanentlyTo(url) instead 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.view.PageResult.redirect(String)
          As of 3.2, replaced by PageResult.redirectTo(String url) 
br.com.caelum.vraptor.http.route.Rules.type(String)
          Override the behavior of RoutesParser instead
